subject: Re: [junit] junit - java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError....
msgSnippet: ... Verify that the COM.rsa.jsafe.JSAFE_InvalidUseException class is somewhere in your classpath.  You could use JWhich
messageBody:
Choe, Mike wrote:

>
> i need help. i am trying to test an entity bean and i got the following
> error message:
>
> java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: COM/rsa/jsafe/JSAFE_InvalidUseException
> at
> (snip)

>

Verify that the COM.rsa.jsafe.JSAFE_InvalidUseException class is
somewhere in your classpath. You could use JWhich
(http://www.clarkware.com/software/jwhich.zip) to verify that the class
exists in the classpath, and if so, where exactly it's located on the
file system.

Mike

--
Mike Clark
Clarkware Consulting, Inc.
Custom Software Architecture, Design,
Development, and Performance Consulting
http://www.clarkware.com
